sentences.sentence: What a damnable climate we have!
sentences.translation: 我们这的气候多讨厌啊！

sentences.sentence: Tragic and most damnable. What was the name of this vile seducer?
sentences.translation: 真是悲哀啊，太卑鄙无耻了这个可恶的骗子是谁？

sentences.sentence: Pucci: Tragic and most damnable. What was the name of this vile seducer?
sentences.translation: 普希：太悲惨了，太可恶了。这个卑鄙的骗子是谁？
